name: Trapped! Possessed House
description:
Your car crashed in the middle of forest at midnight. You are badly injured. You went inside a nearby wooden house looking for some help but found out that the house is possessed with demons. All the doors are locked upon you.

You are in great danger.
You need to find a way to survive, repair your car, and escape these woods!!!


WARNING: DUE TO HEAVY GRAPHICS REQUIREMENTS, 'Trapped! Possessed House' may run slow on IPAD 2, IPHONE 5 (& OLDER IPHONES) OR IPOD TOUCH 5TH GEN (& OLDER IPODS)

We recommend playing on iPHONE 6 (& UP) OR iPAD 3 (& UP) AS iPAD 2, iPAD MINI 1 AND iPHONE 4S MAY EXPERIENCE PROBLEMS.
